00014 HelpStack::HelpStack(QWidget *parent, const char *name)
00015     : QWidget(parent,name)
00016 {
00017     main.vBoxLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00018     main.vBoxLayout->setMargin(5);
00019     main.vBoxLayout->setSpacing(5);
00020     
00021     main.labelLayout = new QBoxLayout(main.vBoxLayout, QBoxLayout::LeftToRight);
00022     
00023     main.topLabel = new GoBackLabel(this);
00024     connect(main.topLabel, SIGNAL(goBack()), this, SIGNAL(goToMain()));
00025     
00026     main.helpContentsButton = new QPushButton(
00027             QIconSet( QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/help.png") ),
00028             "Help Contents (F8)", this);
00029     main.helpContentsButton->setFocusPolicy(QWidget::NoFocus);
00030     connect(main.helpContentsButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(helpContents()));
00031     
00032     main.labelLayout->addWidget(main.topLabel, 0, Qt::AlignLeft | Qt::AlignTop);
00033     main.labelLayout->addStretch();
00034     main.labelLayout->addWidget(main.helpContentsButton);
00035     
00036     main.content = new QTextBrowser(this);
00037     main.content->setVScrollBarMode(QScrollView::AlwaysOn);
00038     main.content->mimeSourceFactory()->addFilePath(HELP_PATH);
00039     main.content->setSource("contents.html");
00040     main.content->installEventFilter(this);
00041     
00042     main.vBoxLayout->addWidget(main.content);
00043     
00044     main.bottomLabel = new QLabel(
00045             "<nobr><b>Keyboard Control:</b></nobr><br>"
00046             "<nobr> &nbsp; &nbsp; <b>Up</b> / <b>Down</b>: Scroll the page</nobr><br>"
00047             "<nobr> &nbsp; &nbsp; <b>Tab</b> / <b>Shift-Tab</b>: Select a link</nobr>", this);
00048     
00049     main.vBoxLayout->addWidget(main.bottomLabel);
00050    
00051 }

00053 HelpStack::~HelpStack()
00054 {}
00055 
00056 void HelpStack::helpContents()
00057 {
00058     main.content->home();
00059 }
00060 
00061 bool HelpStack::eventFilter(QObject *target, QEvent *event)
00062 {
00063     if(event->type() == QEvent::KeyPress)
00064     {
00065         QKeyEvent *keyEvent = (QKeyEvent *)event;
00066         if(keyEvent->key() == Key_Escape)
00067         {
00068             emit goToMain();
00069             return true;
00070         }
00071         if(keyEvent->key() == Key_F8)
00072         {
00073             helpContents();
00074             return true;
00075         }
00076     }
00077     return QWidget::eventFilter(target,event);
00078 }
